comment.author: 29007475@N08
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Vintage Shadow People, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 15705594@N00
comment._content: This locomotive (a C&O "Greenbrier") was at "Travel Town" at Parker Field for many years; it was recently moved to the Science Museum of Virginia to undergo cosmetic restoration.
